name: EpigramsonProgramming
0:
”Alexa, open epigrams on programming”
”Alexa, ask epigrams on programming for an epigram”
”Alexa, ask epigrams on programming to tell me an epigram”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: epigrams on programming
des:
"Epigrams on Programming" is an article by Alan Perlis published in 1982, for ACM's SIGPLAN journal. The epigrams are a series of short, programming-language-neutral, humorous statements about computers and programming, which are widely quoted.

It first appeared in SIGPLAN Notices 17(9), September 1982.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
